Player History
Released by Ashburn on 11/2/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/17/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $678,000 per year...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 9/3/1988, off Perry Drennon (SHP)...
Traded from Plum Grove to Malibu on 2/6/1989 (Going to PG: 3B V. Green. Going to Mal: C S. Martinez, P D. Mozingo)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1991, hitting .600 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
